description: A utility test file for Flutter widget testing, providing helper functions for widget testing scenarios such as image mocking, themed widget pumping, navigation, and input simulation.

methods.name: transparentImageProvider
methods.description: Provides a 1x1 transparent PNG image as an ImageProvider to be used in tests to avoid real network image fetching.

methods.name: pumpThemedWidget
methods.description: Wraps a widget with a MaterialApp configured with a specific theme, then pumps and settles the widget for testing purposes.

methods.name: precacheTransparentImage
methods.description: Pre-caches a transparent image into the widget tree, allowing NetworkImage widgets to resolve quickly during tests.

methods.name: replaceWithTransparentImage
methods.description: Returns an Image widget displaying the transparent image, useful for replacing widget subtrees during tests.

methods.name: tapBottomNavItem
methods.description: Finds a BottomNavigationBar item by label text and performs a tap, then waits for animations to settle.

methods.name: enterTextByHint
methods.description: Finds a TextField by its hint text, enters the input text, and waits for any associated asynchronous updates.
